summary: This is an email exchange regarding the redaction of an exhibit (exhibit 11) in a legal proceeding. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is following up on receiving a newly redacted version of the document.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender/recipient of the email, working at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, is coordinating the receipt of a redacted legal exhibit.

events.title: Email exchange about exhibit redactions
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the submission of a newly redacted version of exhibit 11.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated March 19, 2021, concerning legal procedure.
The subject is the redaction and submission of 'exhibit 11'.
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates an ongoing legal process requiring document redaction.
The file reference EFTA00018381 suggests it is part of a larger document set related to the Epstein case.
